001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import static org.biopax.paxtools.util.SetEquivalenceChecker.hasEquivalentIntersection;
004
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.BioPAXElement;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.BioSource;
007import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.CellVocabulary;
008import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.TissueVocabulary;
009import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.UnificationXref;
010import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.Xref;
011import org.biopax.paxtools.util.ClassFilterSet;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015
016public class BioSourceImpl extends NamedImpl implements BioSource
017{
018        private final static Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BioSourceImpl.class);
019        
020        private CellVocabulary celltype;
021        private TissueVocabulary tissue;
022
023
024        public BioSourceImpl(){
025        }
026
027        //
028        // BioPAXElement interface implementation
029        //
030        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
031        public Class<? extends BioSource> getModelInterface()
032        {
033                return BioSource.class;
034        }
035
036        protected boolean semanticallyEquivalent(BioPAXElement element)
037        {
038                if(!(element instanceof BioSource))
039                        return false;
040                
041                final BioSource bioSource = (BioSource) element;
042
043                return
044                        (celltype != null ?
045                                celltype.isEquivalent(bioSource.getCellType()) :
046                                bioSource.getCellType() == null)
047                        &&
048                                (tissue != null ?
049                                        tissue.isEquivalent(bioSource.getTissue()) :
050                                        bioSource.getTissue() == null)
051                        && hasEquivalentIntersection(
052                                new ClassFilterSet<Xref, UnificationXref>(getXref(), UnificationXref.class),
053                                new ClassFilterSet<Xref, UnificationXref>(bioSource.getXref(), UnificationXref.class));
054    }
055
056        public int equivalenceCode()
057        {
058                int result = 29 *super.equivalenceCode() + (celltype != null ? celltype.hashCode() : 0);
059                result = 29 * result + (tissue != null ? tissue.hashCode() : 0);
060                return result;
061        }
062
063        //
064        // BioSource interface implementation
065        //
066        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
067        public CellVocabulary getCellType()
068        {
069                return celltype;
070        }
071
072        public void setCellType(CellVocabulary celltype)
073        {
074                this.celltype = celltype;
075        }
076
077        public TissueVocabulary getTissue()
078        {
079                return tissue;
080        }
081
082        public void setTissue(TissueVocabulary tissue)
083        {
084                this.tissue = tissue;
085        }
086
087
088        @Override
089        public String toString() {
090                try {
091                        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
092                        sb.append(getUri()).append(" ");
093                        sb.append(getName().toString());
094                        if (tissue != null)
095                                sb.append(" tissue: ").append(tissue.getTerm().toString());
096                        if (celltype != null)
097                                sb.append(" celltype: ").append(celltype.getTerm().toString());
098                        sb.append(" xrefs: ").append(getXref().toString());
099                        return sb.toString();
100                } catch (Exception e) {
101                        // possible issues - when in a persistent context (e.g., lazy collections init...)
102                        LOG.warn("Error in toString(): ", e);
103                        return getUri();
104                }
105        }
106}
